description: This course closely examines a specific period in the history of cinema or other media. Students study the relationship between film and media texts and their historical context and social environment. The course rotates topics to emphasize either an influential period (national or global) or historical movements. May be repeated if topics are different. Offered alternate years in the fall semester beginning fall semester 2021-22.
name: Top: New Hollywood Cinema

revisions.name: Top: Topics: Film and Media History

title: Topics: Film and Media History
